MenuBar_UpdateMessage_Text:
Layout, style, stats, default metric, are all customizable in the settings.

If anything is broken, weird, or if you have any suggestion, do not hesitate
to create an issue on the GitHub repo.
Main_IconError:
An error occured with icons.
Please create an issue on the GitHub with a screenshot of the red lines in /xllog.
This is probably due to TexTools corrupting your game files.
This shouldn't affect the party members functionality.
Main_InvalidAPIClient: API client not valid, click to open settings.
Main_APIClientNotSetup: API client not setup, click to open settings.
Main_OpenOnFFLogs: Click to open on FF Logs
Main_NoLayoutSetup: You have no layout set up. Click to open settings.
Main_NotSupportedMetricWarning:
This metric is not supported by this encounter.
For old content, aDPS and HPS are usually the only allowed metrics.
Layout_AutoUpdateLayout_Help_Enabled: The layout will automatically update with new encounters, if the plugin is updated.
Layout_AutoUpdateLayout_Help_Disabled:
The layout will not automatically update if the plugin is updated.
You will have to add new encounters yourself.
Layout_ResetLayout_Popup:
This will WIPE any changes you have made.
Are you sure you want to do this?
Layout_Delete_Popup:
This will DELETE all the entries.
Are you sure you want to do this?
Misc_LogDecimalDigit: Number of decimal digits for logs:
Misc_EnableContextMenu_Help: Add a button to search characters in most context menus.
Misc_OpenInBrower_Help:
The button in context menus opens
FF Logs in your default browser instead
of opening the plugin window.
Misc_StreamerMode_Help:
When the main window is open, opening a context menu
will automatically search for the selected player.
This mode does not add a button to the context menu.
Misc_API_Client_Tutorial: How to get a client ID and a client secret:
Misc_API_Client_Tutorial_5: Do NOT check the Public Client option
Misc_API_Client_Tutorial_6: Paste both client ID and secret above
PopupEntry_NoZoneFound: No zone found for this expansion.
PopupEntry_NoEncounterFound: No encounter found for this expansion.
PopupEntry_EncounterAlreadyInLayout: Note: this encounter is already in the layout.
Stats_DefaultMetric_Help: Can be temporarily overridden in the main window
Stats_BestAmountHelp: If the alias is /metric/ the alias will be replaced by the current metric
Style_AutoResize_Help: Will expand and shrink based on content.
Style_FixedMinSize_Help: Will not be under, will expand and shrink a little bit to accomodate long names.
Error_FillInfo: Please fill first name, last name, and world
Error_CannotReachServer: Could not reach FF Logs servers
Error_CannotFetchWorldName: Character world is invalid, please try again
Error_CharacterNotFound: Character not found on FF Logs
Error_InvalidApiClient: API Client not valid, check config
